Name: Hover 2030
About the game: Hoverboards, evil robots, and cloning! Welcome to the future. The year is 2030 and all mankind has been exterminated by an wicked race of robots who now own the planet earth. Only one man, armed with a hoverboard and cloning machine, dares to defy. Includes Xbox gamepad support (if supported by your OS). YouTube Let's Play/Reviewers : Feel free to use Hover 2030 gameplay in your online monetized videos.
